mapper.select: SELECT eo.*, u.nickname AS user_nickname FROM exchange_order eo LEFT JOIN user_info u ON eo.user_id = u.id WHERE eo.id = #{id}
SELECT eo.*, u.nickname AS user_nickname FROM exchange_order eo LEFT JOIN user_info u ON eo.user_id = u.id WHERE eo.order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exchange_order (id, user_id, order_no, total_points, status, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, logistics_info, remark, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{orderNo}, #{totalPoints}, #{status}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverAddress}, #{logisticsInfo}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
